title: If A NYC Fashion Person Were Scrolling Through Amazon, They’d Shop These 27 Basics
excerpt: Shop the best basics from Amazon that a chic fashion person would snatch up immediately. We've hand-picked the most stylish basics to mix and match endlessly all season long.
text: We all know basics are the building blocks to any good wardrobe. However, finding solid pieces that are chic and reliable is a whole other feat. Well, as your resident fashion expert and shopping editor, I’m here to make that task just a little bit easier. I’ve searched and scoured Amazon’s robust selection of online goods and found the best basics that rival more expensive finds. If you’re looking to add some pieces you can reach for over and over again without fail, then look no further.I’ve lived in both LA and NYC and can guarantee you that fashion people all over would find a piece or two worth snagging in this editor-approved lineup of top-tier basics. In the mix, you can expect to find easy dresses, gorgeous denim, elevated tops, and so much more. Keep scrolling to give your basics a much-needed refresh now. The Drop Blake Long Blazer You'll wear this blazer all year long. Levi's Ribcage Wide Leg Jeans Many of our editor's love these Ribcage Levi's. PUMIEY Slim Fit Short Sleeve T Shirt You can't go wrong with an easy white tee. These will go with so much. IWH High Waisted Dressy Tailored Work Short Long shorts have taken over. adidas Unisex Samba Indoor Sneaker Adidas are a staple in any chic person's wardrobe at this point. The Drop Dia Mixed Fabric Midi Tank Dress Throw this on and put on an easy pair of flats for an instantly put together look. QINSEN Square Neck Sleeveless Double-Layer Tank Top I'm loving the square neckline. The Drop Daphne Square Neck Linen Maxi Dress Simple white dresses are great for the warm-weather ahead. ANRABESS Boho Flowy Swing Tiered A-Line Maxi Skirt Pair with simple tops and sweaters. The Drop Frida Relaxed Fit Jeans Such a steal for chic denim. Steve Madden Slinky30 Wedge Sandal This nostalgic style is a great summer sandal option. MEROKEETY Ribbed Tank Top Trendy Queen Off the Shoulder Top Wear this top multiple ways. The Drop Florencia Smocked Bodice Linen Maxi Dress While red isn't a common color for a basic, the simplicity and ease of this dress lends itself to mixing and matching easily with almost any other item in this list. Cheval Flat Leather Flip Flops If you don't own a pair of elevated flip flops, what are you doing? The Drop Kamila A-Line Mini Skort I love that this skirt has a faux wrap-skirt look to it. The Drop Essie Linen Pull on Mini Short Everyday shorts for those scorching hot months. The Drop Samantha Flat Strappy Lace-Up Sandal Pair with jeans, dresses, or shorts. PUMIEY Summer Slip Sleeveless Dress It's giving Skims but for less. PINKMSTYLE Basic Double Lined Tank Tops A classic black tank top is a must. DREAM PAIRS Chunky Loafers Chunky loafers look so great with jeans and trousers. ZESICA Short Sleeve Sweater Top Arach&Cloz Short Sleeve Sweater Another short-sleeve sweater for your consideration. Trendy Queen Going Out Summer Tank Top There's no such thing as too many simple tops. ANRABESS Button Down Cropped Knit Lady Jacket This Lady Jacket has a J.Crew feel to it but for one third of the price. Amazon Essentials Belice Slip on Ballet Flat Black ballet flats are a no brainer. Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
html:
We all know basics are the building blocks to any good wardrobe. However, finding solid pieces that are chic and reliable is a whole other feat. Well, as your resident fashion expert and shopping editor, I’m here to make that task just a little bit easier. I’ve searched and scoured Amazon’s robust selection of online goods and found the best basics that rival more expensive finds. If you’re looking to add some pieces you can reach for over and over again without fail, then look no further.

I’ve lived in both LA and NYC and can guarantee you that fashion people all over would find a piece or two worth snagging in this editor-approved lineup of top-tier basics. In the mix, you can expect to find easy dresses, gorgeous denim, elevated tops, and so much more. Keep scrolling to give your basics a much-needed refresh now.

The Drop

Blake Long Blazer

You'll wear this blazer all year long.

Levi's

Ribcage Wide Leg Jeans

Many of our editor's love these Ribcage Levi's.

PUMIEY

Slim Fit Short Sleeve T Shirt

You can't go wrong with an easy white tee.

These will go with so much.

IWH

High Waisted Dressy Tailored Work Short

Long shorts have taken over.

adidas

Unisex Samba Indoor Sneaker

Adidas are a staple in any chic person's wardrobe at this point.

The Drop

Dia Mixed Fabric Midi Tank Dress

Throw this on and put on an easy pair of flats for an instantly put together look.

QINSEN

Square Neck Sleeveless Double-Layer Tank Top

I'm loving the square neckline.

The Drop

Daphne Square Neck Linen Maxi Dress

Simple white dresses are great for the warm-weather ahead.

ANRABESS

Boho Flowy Swing Tiered A-Line Maxi Skirt

Pair with simple tops and sweaters.

The Drop

Frida Relaxed Fit Jeans

Such a steal for chic denim.

Steve Madden

Slinky30 Wedge Sandal

This nostalgic style is a great summer sandal option.

MEROKEETY

Ribbed Tank Top

Trendy Queen

Off the Shoulder Top

Wear this top multiple ways.

The Drop

Florencia Smocked Bodice Linen Maxi Dress

While red isn't a common color for a basic, the simplicity and ease of this dress lends itself to mixing and matching easily with almost any other item in this list.

Cheval

Flat Leather Flip Flops

If you don't own a pair of elevated flip flops, what are you doing?

The Drop

Kamila A-Line Mini Skort

I love that this skirt has a faux wrap-skirt look to it.

The Drop

Essie Linen Pull on Mini Short

Everyday shorts for those scorching hot months.

The Drop

Samantha Flat Strappy Lace-Up Sandal

Pair with jeans, dresses, or shorts.

PUMIEY

Summer Slip Sleeveless Dress

It's giving Skims but for less.

PINKMSTYLE

Basic Double Lined Tank Tops

A classic black tank top is a must.

DREAM PAIRS

Chunky Loafers

Chunky loafers look so great with jeans and trousers.

ZESICA

Short Sleeve Sweater Top

Arach&Cloz

Short Sleeve Sweater

Another short-sleeve sweater for your consideration.

Trendy Queen

Going Out Summer Tank Top

There's no such thing as too many simple tops.

ANRABESS

Button Down Cropped Knit Lady Jacket

This Lady Jacket has a J.Crew feel to it but for one third of the price.

Amazon Essentials

Belice Slip on Ballet Flat

Black ballet flats are a no brainer.

Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
